Overriding views
---
### Example

In your app config
```php
'view' => [
    'theme' => [
        'pathMap' => [
            '@nickdenry/ckeditorRoxyFileman/views' => '@app/views/roxy'
        ],
    ],
],
```

@see [views overriding details](https://github.com/2amigos/yii2-usuario/blob/master/docs/enhancing-and-overriding/overriding-views.md)
